history.notes: Project manager skill created. UI is built. Next step is to implement Firebase logic for clock-in/out and photo uploads.
Created jobLogService.ts with clockIn, clockOut, and addPhoto functions for Firebase.
Stabilization v1 complete: ErrorBoundaries added, resumable uploads with progress UI implemented, file validation added, and dead code marked for deletion.
Verified clock-in timer fixed (zeroes out correctly). Multi-file upload added and tested successfully. UI updates instantly.
Verified 3-Tier Training Module works. Users can set their Level in Profile.tsx, and Training.tsx dynamically updates Checklists and Videos based on that rank.
